author: markrmiller
msg: LUCENE-1465: (2.4 backport) NearSpansOrdered returns payloads from first possible match rather than the correct, shortest match; Payloads could be returned even if the max slop was exceeded; The wrong payload could be returned in certain situations.

msg: Updates to the DOAP file for Xerces-C 3.0.1.
